name: Space Turret Gunner 宇宙大炮手
description: 《SpaceTurretGuner》is a VR shooting game, as a gunner of the space battleship, players will experience many battles we carefully prepared for you。
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Windows Mixed Reality users can only use Windows 10
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD RX Vega 64 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
